  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2220</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2220</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Bridging the Gap</string>
            <string language="en">"Bridging the Gap"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">", den Abstand füllend"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"établissant le lien"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"construindo uma ponte sobre a abertura"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"colmando la lacuna"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Γεφυρώνοντας το χάσμα"</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Material interactiu que consta de 12 unitats en què es desenvolupen les competències comunicatives i es practiquen les habilitats lingüístiques, utilitzant una varietat de temes i activitats. Conté enllaços a llocs d'Internet per fer diferents  projectes. Accés restringit a usuaris edu365 i xtec.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive material made up of 12 units to develop communicative competence and practise linguistic skills using a variety of topics and activities. It includes Internet links to carry out different projects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Material bildete von 12 
Maßeinheiten, um mitteilsame Kompetenz zu entwickeln und 
linguistische Fähigkeiten mit einer Vielzahl von Themen und von 
Aktivitäten zu üben. Es schließt Internet-Links ein, um 
unterschiedliche Projekte durchzuführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le matériel interactif a composé de 12 unités 
pour développer la compétence communicative et pour pratiquer des 
qualifications linguistiques en utilisant une variété de sujets et 
d'activités. Il inclut des liens d'Internet pour mettre 
différents projets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O material interativo compôs de 12 unidades para
desenvolver o competence communicative e para praticar habilidades 
lingüísticas usando uma variedade dos tópicos e das atividades. 
Inclui as ligações do Internet para realizar projetos 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il materiale interattivo ha composto di 12 unità
per sviluppare la competenza comunicativa e per esercitarsi nelle 
abilità linguistiche usando una varietà di soggetti e di attività. 
Include i collegamenti del Internet per effettuare i progetti 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό υλικό φιαγμένο επάνω από 12 μονάδες για
να αναπτύξει τις επικοινωνιακές γλωσσικές δεξιότητες ικανότητας 
και πρακτικής που χρησιμοποιούν ποικίλες θέματα και 
δραστηριότητες. Περιλαμβάνει τις συνδέσεις Διαδικτύου για να
εκτελέσει τα διαφορετικά προγράμματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
